title: Troubleshoot Fuel Terminal Automation
description: A truck driver at a fuel loading terminal reports that the automated system is not recognizing their access card. A support technician must troubleshoot remotely.

tasks.description: Look up the driver's account in the terminal automation system using their name or company.
Check the status of the driver's certifications (e.g., safety training) to ensure they are up to date.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system shows the driver's safety certification expired yesterday.

tasks.description: Inform the driver that their access is denied due to an expired certification and instruct them on how to renew it online.
tasks.expected_outcome: The root cause is communicated clearly to the driver with instructions for resolution.
